                                                              com.amazonaws.regions.Regions region,
                                                              SqsQueueClientConfig clientConfig)
        Parameters:
        queueName - Name of the SQS queue. This queue must already exist, it will not be created.
        region - Region this queue exists in
        clientConfig - Configuration values for the queue client
        Returns:
        an SqsQueue

      • upsertQueue

        public io.reactivex.Single<SqsQueue<String>> upsertQueue(SqsQueueConfig queueConfig,
                                                         SqsQueueClientConfig clientConfig)
        Asserts that an SQS queue exists with specific attributes. The queue is created if it does not exist, and any existing queue is modified if the attributes don't match.
        Parameters:
        queueConfig - Configuration of the SQS queue
        clientConfig - Configuration of the SQS queue client
        Returns:
        an SqsQueue

      • upsertQueue

        public io.reactivex.Single<SqsQueue<String>> upsertQueue(SqsQueueConfig queueConfig)
        Asserts that an SQS queue exists with specific attributes. The queue is created if it does not exist, and any existing queue is modified if the attributes don't match.
        Parameters:
        queueConfig - Configuration of the SQS queue
        Returns:
        an SqsQueue
